item.title: Multiple p5js Canvases on One Page
item.description: It was fairly easy to set up integration of p5js into my blog posts if I needed only one canvas per post. Having multiple canvases turned out to be a bit more complicated. Since I spent several hours setting it up, I can as well write a post about it. Two modes of p5js It turns out there are two modes that p5 can work with: global and instance. Read more here: https://github.
